H0.text: At 7am on Saturday 19 May 2012 which gold medalist started the torch delay in Lands End. Chris Hoy

H1.text: At 7am on Saturday 19 May 2012 which gold medalist started the torch delay in Lands End. Steve Redgrave

H2.text: At 7am on Saturday 19 May 2012 which gold medalist started the torch delay in Lands End. Kelly Holmes

H3.text: At 7am on Saturday 19 May 2012 which gold medalist started the torch delay in Lands End. Ben Ainslie

A4.text: Olympic sailing star Ben Ainslie ran the first leg of the relay.
